actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported to Senate by Senator Baker for Senator Percy without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 670.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution relating to the imprisonment of Yuri Badzyo.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should: (1) express U.S. opposition to the Soviet Union's imprisonment of Yuri Badzyo; (2) urge the Soviet Union to release Badzyo and stop harassing him and his family; and (3) inform the Soviet Union that the United States, in evaluating its relations with other countries, will consider the extent to which those countries honor their commitments to human rights under international law.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the imprisonment of Yuri Badzyo.
